title: RxConfig Compiler Options
description: JSON Schema for `rxconfig.json` description file `compiler` options.

outDir.description: Specify the output directory of the emitted file relative to rxconfig.json. Defaults to `./config`.

baseUrl.description: Specify the path to the configuration directory relative to rxconfig.json. Defaults to `./dist`.

overloads.description: Overload core configurations with project configurations.

sanitizeKeys.description: Covert underscores and dashes in configuration names to camelCase
